duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide acquisition support to System Program Office (SPO) by assessing development contractor milestone reviews, overall program progress, risks, and technical baseline feasibility.
Oversee integration and development of space control operations system as a Command and Control Subject Matter Expert (C2 SME).
Support requirements development, interface control documentation, technical specification review, architecture, and CONOPS development.
Assist in translating space operator mission requirements to developer capabilities.
Review documentation, represent government as required in forums that support streamlined delivery of new capabilities and standardization of integration efforts.
Develop and maintain interface specifications with existing and/or new systems and/or applications.
Oversee integration and development of space control operations system as a Command and Control Subject Matter Expert (C2 SME).

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's of Science degree in Science, Technology, Engineering, and Math (STEM), Engineering Management, Business Administration, OR relevant field required with 9+ years of relevant experience.
In-scope background investigation (SSBI/T5) and the ability to obtain Sensitive Compartment Information and Special Access Program accesses.
